itunes:title: Episode 766 - Special Guest Gary Brugman, the Border Patrol Agent Pardoned by Donald Trump
title: Episode 766 - Special Guest Gary Brugman, the Border Patrol Agent Pardoned by Donald Trump
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Gary Brugman, a Border Patrol agent who was pardoned by President Donald Trump after he was wrongfully convicted and sent to federal prison for two years for allegedly violating the civil rights of two illega...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Gary Brugman, a Border Patrol agent who was pardoned by President Donald Trump after he was wrongfully convicted and sent to federal prison for two years for allegedly violating the civil rights of two illegal aliens. Brugman shares his ordeal, what happened at his trial, why he thinks a drug cartel may have been involved, and what it took to get his pardon.
